chat_history: {'assistant1': "Welcome to BestCompany! I'm Anne, your virtual assistant. This is an open-language chat, but I can also handle some requests automatically. If you have any other questions, feel free to ask!', 'user3': "Could you tell me why it's on hold?", 'assistant4': "I understand that you want help with Check Status Info. If I'm correct, please type 'yes'. Otherwise, type 'no'.", 'user4': "No, I know the status. I'm asking why it's on hold.", 'assistant5': "I apologize for the inconvenience. Let me check that for you.\n\nCould you please provide me with your contact information, such as your email address or phone number? Please let me know what you find out or have someone contact me directly. Thank you.', 'assistant6': "I understand that you want help with Request Human Representative. If I'm correct, please type 'yes'. Otherwise, type 'no'.", 'user6': 'yes', 'assistant7': "To leave a request for a human representative, I'll need three things.
